title: Book With Embroidered Cover, 1635
medium:
Medium: paper, silk, metallic thread
Technique: embroidered on satin weave
dimensions: H x W x D: 8 x 5.1 x 2.5 cm (3 1/8 in. x 2 in. x 1 in.)
description: "The Psalmes" covered in cream satin embroidered with a tulip design embossed in an oval frame using multicolored silks and metallic thread. Title page is missing.
